text:
The sentence

"To utilize an XML parser in a single web application, simply include the 
parser's JAR files in the /WEB-INF/web.xml directory of that web application."

in

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.0-doc/class-loader-howto.html

should read:

"To utilize an XML parser in a single web application, simply include the 
parser's JAR files in the /WEB-INF/lib directory of that web application."
creator: szegedia@freemail.hu

text: That page has finally been fully updated for the 4.0 branch.
creator: remm@apache.org
